content: magic stripe hotpad or scarf sara h baldwin the magic of this design is that the color stripes are vertical on one side and horizontal on the other the simple slip_stitch pattern may seem a bit fussy at first but it is easily memorized after a few row materials for hotpad cotton worsted weight yarn 1 ball each of two colors a and b and two double-pointed or one circular knitting needle size 2 for scarf 2 ounces each of two colors of worsted weight wool a and b color- shifting yarns like noro mochi or knitpicks chroma work well two double-pointed or one circular knitting needle size 8 for hotpad using #2 needles with cotton yarn and color a cast on 51 stitches multiple of 4 plus 3 for scarf using #8 needles with wool yarn and color a cast on 31 stitches multiple of 4 plus 3 do not turn work but slide to the other end of your circular or double-pointed needle and begin row 1 with color b 1 b k1 s1wyif k1* p1 k1 s1wyif k1* turn 2 b p1 s1wyib p1 *k1 p1 s1wyib p1* slide 3 a p1 k1 p1 *s1wyib p1 k1 p1* turn 4 a k1 p1 k1 *s1wyif k1 p1 k1* slide repeat these four row until the hotpad is square or the scarf is of the desired length bind off k1 k1 k2tog s1wyib= slip one with yarn in back s1wyif= slip one with yarn in front
